Name: Jigsaw Novel - Sexy Job Interview
About the game: Jane's job interview turns into an unexpected sex experience, due to a wrong choice of outfit. Solve all 12 jigsaw puzzles to find out what naughty things Jane has done at her job interview. Features: 12 different puzzles to solve, which present a mini novel in images Timer, to see how long it takes to solve a puzzle Gallery where you can view all the puzzle images you have solved. Relaxing background music to match the theme and mood. Be among our most engaged players to achieve a top spot in our Leaderboards and unlock various achievements.
